Uses of Class
org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ControlPanelException

  • Packages that use ControlPanelException 
    Package Description
    org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice
    The package includes classes that allow to start the control panel service ControlPanelService, and manage the list of controllable devices ControllableDevice.
    org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui
    The package includes classes that represent the UI widgets and its metadata
    The UI widget classes are used to receive the initial values that were set by the remotely controllable device.

    • Uses of ControlPanelException in org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

      Adds a ControlPanel for the given objectPath.

      Creates a NotificationAction control panel for the given objectPath
      The method should be used after establishment a session with a controllable device

      Creates object of controllable device.

      Creates object of controllable device.

      java.lang.String Unit.getRootURL() 
      void ControlPanelService.init(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus)
      Starts ControlPanelService without discovering new devices in proximity
      void ControlPanelService.init(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus, DeviceRegistry deviceRegistry)
      Starts ControlPanelService which discovers controllable devices in its proximity.
      void ControllableDevice.startSession(DeviceEventsListener eventsListener)
      Starts the session with the remote controllable device
